participant_1.background:
I'm not ready to tell my family about my sexuality.
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.
i have a dog.

participant_2.background:
I love my job as an accountant, but I can't stand heights.
I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
i check my reflection in the mirror constantly.
I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to?
Hi! I'm going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!
That sounds like fun! I'm not ready to tell my family about my sexuality, but I'm proud of you for being able to be open about it!
Thanks! I know it's not easy, but it's important to be true to yourself.
I agree! I love listening to the Beatles every morning before work. It helps me start my day off on the right foot.
I love the Beatles too! I'm not sure what I would do without them.
I know, right? They're the best!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I love my job, but I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.
That's great! I'm an accountant, and I love my job too. But I can't stand heights.
Oh no! That must be tough.
It is! But I try to avoid them as much as possible.
Well, I'm glad you're happy with your job.
